comment.author: 64288588@N05
comment._content: Sir James Hope Nelson, 2nd Baronet Acton Park, Denbigh. Wikipedia page en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Nelson_baronets Born 1883 in Liverpool. Married twice to (1) Isabel Valle 1913 (divorced 1921), daughter of Dr Jules F Valle of St Louis, USA. (2) Annie Bryan 1923, daughter of Lt Col Loftus Bryan of Bormount Manor, Wexford, Ireland. www.ebooksread.com/authors-eng/arthur-charles-fox-davies/... His Medal Roll Index Card lists him as a Lieutenant in the Labour Corps. Notes his address as Clonbarron, Athboy, Co. Meath. Eligible 21.12.18.
